title: Aditya College Of Engineering and Technology: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Aditya College Of Engineering and Technology Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Aditya College Of Engineering and Technology Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Aditya College Of Engineering and Technology Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: Colours the cultural fest: Activities like singing, dancing and skitting is involved in the cultural festival “COLOURS” of the college which is celebrated every year in the month of January. It is a three-day event, featuring many games, exhibitions, competitions and musical concerts.

Veda the technical fest: VEDA, the annual tech fest of the college is organized each year in the month of September. The nearby colleges are specially invited to participate in this tech fest. It continues for two-days. Various events like powerpoint presentations, Robotics and speeches from guest speakers are performed.

Section.name: About ACET
Section.description:
Sri Sai Aditya Institute Of Science & Technology was established in 2004, and runs under the aegis of Sarojini Educational Society. The college is situated in is situated in a serene, scenic campus in Surampalem.

Scholarship:
All the students belonging to BC / EBC /Disabled Welfare / Minority Welfare whose family income is less than Rs. 1.00 lakh per annum are eligible to apply for scholarships whereas SC/ ST students can also apply whose family income is less than Rs. 2.00 lakh per annum.
